title: Google confirms Pixel 6 Wi-Fi issues, fix coming with March update
content:
Following the February security patch, some Pixel 6 and 6 Pro owners encountered Wi-Fi issues. Google today confirmed the Pixel 6 problem and said it will be fixed with the upcoming March update.

more…

The post Google confirms Pixel 6 Wi-Fi issues, fix coming with March update  appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google today confirmed the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro's Wi-Fi issues following the February security patch and said it will be fixed in March...
